about_p1: Hello, I'm José María Trillo Sánchez. A software development student.
about_p2: I am skilled in HTML, CSS, JS, and PHP, and I'm always eager to learn more. I particularly enjoy front-end development and the design behind websites and desktop applications.
about_p3: This portfolio showcases projects where I've been able to apply what I've learned. My goal is to establish myself as a developer, in order to grow and contribute to creating valuable technology.
